name: gallimap
description: Gallimap is a comprehensive library that provides an easy-to-implement solution for various mapping and geospatial features. It allows developers to seamlessly integrate interactive maps, 360-degree image views, search and autocomplete functionalities, routing, amenities, and other geolocation-based services into their web applications. Whether you're building a location-based service or adding advanced map features to your project, Gallimap streamlines the implementation of these capabilities, enhancing user experiences with rich, interactive, and customizable maps.
author: sandeep shrestha
